column2: Ghana’s rural savannah areas suffer persistently high poverty

Rural savannah in this report is the agro-ecological zones of the three northern regions and some parts of Volta and Brong Ahafo regions respectively with a population of 4.7 million people.  
**Based on national extreme poverty line of $1.10 per day.
